    • basePackageClass

      public HandlerTypePredicate.Builder basePackageClass(Class<?>... packageClasses)
      Type-safe alternative to HandlerTypePredicate.forBasePackage(String...) to specify a base package through a class.
      Parameters:
      packageClasses - one or more base package names

    • assignableType

      public HandlerTypePredicate.Builder assignableType(Class<?>... types)

      Match types that are annotated with one of the given annotations.
      Parameters:
      annotations - one or more annotations to check for
